      • loadProductsIntoSolr

        public static void loadProductsIntoSolr()
                                 throws KKAdminException,
                                        org.apache.torque.TorqueException,
                                        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                        java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Load Products Into Solr
        Throws:
        KKAdminException - an unexpected exception in the KonaKart Admin engine
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException - an unexpected exception in Torque (the database layer)
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - an unexpected InvocationTargetException exception
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - an unexpected ClassNotFoundException exception
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - an unexpected IllegalAccessException exception
        java.lang.InstantiationException - an unexpected InstantiationException exception
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - an unexpected IllegalArgumentException exception
